greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of g.f.: (1+x)/(1-41*x).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..600
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (41).
formula: a(0) = 1; for n>0, a(n) = 42*41^(n-1). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 05 2009
program: (PARI) vector(26, n, k=42; if(n==1, 1, k*(k-1)^(n-2))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 10 2019
(GAP) k:=42;; Concatenation([1], List([1..25], n-> k*(k-1)^(n-1) )); # _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 10 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 04 2009
